title: Star Wars: The Force Unleashed
description: This game supports English, French, Italian, German, and Spanish. Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual". The Star Wars saga continues in Star Wars: The Force Unleashed!  Take on the role of Darth Vader’s “Secret Apprentice” in a new chapter of the saga set during the largely unexplored era between Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith and Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope.                   Unleash over-the-top Force powers and devastating attack combos on enemies with unique behaviors and reactions every single time you play. Metal bends like metal, wood splinters like wood, and glass shatters like glass as you unleash the Force like never before. Scour the galaxy and defeat Jedi Masters on familiar worlds, including Cloud City, and on strange new worlds, such as the junk planet Raxus Prime. Destroy all who stand in your way in your ultimate quest to do Darth Vader’s bidding.                   Star Wars: The Force Unleashed allows you to feel the power of the Force like never before in a brand new Star Wars story where your decisions could change the ultimate destiny of the galaxy. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: A New Chapter: The Story of The Force Unleashed (HD)
childDownloads.description: Get some brand new insights and plot points on the Story of Star Wars: The Force Unleashed, a new chapter of the saga set between Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith and Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope.   Learn why the game’s story takes place turning this fertile time period of the saga, and get glimpses into how iconic Star Wars characters and events play a part of The Force Unleashed and its deep story.

childDownloads.title: Apprentice Outfit
childDownloads.description: A powerful, almost primal Force wielder, Darth Vader's secret apprentice has been trained by the Dark Lord of the Sith to hunt down the last remaining Jedi. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Dark Lord’s Armor
childDownloads.description: An intimidating suit of Sith armor. Inspired by the design worn by Starkiller’s predecessor, but built for greater speed and agility. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Force Unleashed T-shirt
childDownloads.description: Show off your Jedi Powers with this Force Unleashed t-shirt. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Jedi Temple Mission Pack
childDownloads.description: The Apprentice Mission Pack contains an entirely new single-player mission set in the Jedi Temple on the planet Coruscant.  In this mission Darth Vader’s Secret Apprentice turns to the Jedi Temple to learn more about his father, and while searching through the rubble of the destroyed building he must confront his inner demons... Download this mission pack and you’ll also get 6 brand new characters and 3 all new Secret Apprentice costumes. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Jedi Temple Theme Pack
childDownloads.description: Now that you’ve unleashed the Force you can make the experience even more memorable by downloading the Star Wars®: The Force Unleashed™ Jedi Temple Theme pack! It contains the Landing Pad/Coruscant Vista, Great Hall, Museum, and Trial of the Mind Hall. Download The Force Unleashed Jedi Temple Theme Pack today! There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Juno Eclipse Outfit
childDownloads.description: A dedicated Imperial officer nearly all of her life; Captain Juno Eclipse was hand-picked by Darth Vader to pilot his secret apprentice -- the agent Starkiller -- across the galaxy. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Mouse Droid
childDownloads.description: Small and incongruous on the decks of powerful Imperial war machines, mouse droids are ever-present annoyances buzzing back and forth between tasks. They are small, boxy wheeled droids that provide courier and minor maintenance duties. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Picture Pack 1
childDownloads.description: Show the community that you are powerful with the force with Darth Vader’s Secret Apprentice picture pack from Star Wars The Force Unleashed. No one is safe from Vader’s Apprentice and four other pictures including Proxy, the droid sidekick, the beautiful Imperial pilot, Juno Eclipse, an Imperial Stormtrooper, and the destructive AT-ST. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Picture Pack 2
childDownloads.description: For the first time ever, you can be the Dark Lord of the Sith, Darth Vader, and his Secret Apprentice from Star Wars The Force Unleashed. childDownloads.title: STAR WARS®: THE FORCE UNLEASHED™ Character Pack #1
childDownloads.description: Now that you’ve unleashed the force you can download 7 brand new characters to the make the experience even more memorable! Also you’ll get 3 all new Secret Apprentice costumes including Hooded Combat Gear, General Starkiller and Sith Assassin. So what are you waiting for, download STAR WARS®: THE FORCE UNLEASHED™ character pack today! There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: STAR WARS: THE FORCE UNLEASHED HOTH MISSION PACK
childDownloads.description: The search for Luke Skywalker leads the Apprentice ("Starkiller") to the Rebel's hidden base on the ice planet, Hoth. Under orders by the Emperor to eliminate Skywalker, Starkiller must infiltrate Echo Base and fight through Rebel forces, while also encountering deadly, ferocious wampas. The fate of the galaxy hangs in the balance! There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: STAR WARS: THE FORCE UNLEASHED TATOOINE MISSION PACK
childDownloads.description: Artoo-detoo and See-Threepio have crash-landed on Tatooine carrying important data that the Apprentice (“Starkiller”) must intercept. Star Wars: The Force Unleashed allows you to feel the power of the Force like never before in a brand new Star Wars story where your decisions could change the ultimate destiny of the galaxy.
